data.title: GameSpy: Gameloft
data.meta_description: Gameloft at GameSpy - View Gameloft profile, all the games created and published by Gameloft plus news about their latest games.
data.text:
Gameloft is an international developer and publisher of video games for mobile phones. Gameloft was created in December of 1999. Employees number over 300 worldwide, and they have unique expertise in game development and publishing.
